## fromEndPoints variable

Conversion from endpoint to center parameterization.

[https://svgwg.org/svg2-draft/implnote.html\#ArcConversionEndpointToCenter](https://svgwg.org/svg2-draft/implnote.html#ArcConversionEndpointToCenter)

Returns undefined if `a` &amp; `b` are equal or any `radii` component is zero.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromEndPoints: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, radii: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, axis?: number, xl?: boolean, cw?: boolean) => {
    center: Vec;
    r: Vec;
    axis: number;
    start: number;
    end: number;
    xl: boolean;
    cw: boolean;
} | undefined
```
